start accepting card payments today

Unlock the potential of integrated payments with the EMV ready Handpoint solution

Secure card readers supporting MSR, EMV and NFC

Simple and adaptable pricing for partners & merchants

Cloud based payment gateway and terminal management system

Links to processors in North America, Europe and Africa

Cool Terminals

Simple Pricing

Cloud Gateway

Global Reach

Enabling Hardware

Say  to our card readers

Handpoint offers two different card readers for all kinds of situations, fixed or mobile, in a store, in the street or even at the top of a mountain, you can accept card payments everywhere. Magstripe, contactless and chip cards are supported by our devices as well as Apple Pay and Android Pay. With our unique EMV pre-certified terminals, credit and debit card processing has never been made so easy.

AND

Enabling Software

Control the checkout experience

Handpoint API's offer a quick integration and an easy route to market for companies wanting to add card payment capabilites to their point-of-sale (POS) solutions. Our software development kit (SDK), available on three platforms, iOS, Android and Windows allows the POS developers to have full control over the card reader and deliver a seamless and integrated experience to their merchants.

Global reach - Process payments around the globe

Global reach

Strive for growth by partnering with Handpoint

With its extended network of partners, Handpoint can offer you a fully fledged point-of-sale solution adapted to your needs. From PC and tablet point-of-sale systems to a simple mobile phone application for smaller or occasional merchants we adapt our offer to your business.

As a point-of-sale developer you are probably looking for an easy and integrated way to accept card payments.That is why Handpoint offers you a simple, yet powerful development kit to integrate with our card readers. We take care of all the payment logic so that you can carry a full integration within few days.

If you are interested by reselling Handpoint integrated payment solution we would love to explore opportunities with you. We can offer support, documentation, white labeling and rebranding of our card readers so that you can personalize the solution to your needs.
